Sentence: The fool does think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool.
Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
Show all your love on your friend, but do not show all your trust on him.
Whoever touches his heart the exaggerated love for life, his heart will be surrounded by three things: worry that he does not lose, a desire that he does not leave, and hope that he does not realize.
Too much laughter kills the heart.
Speak only when your words are more beneficial than your silence.
